full_description:
WiWU Q1 Air Conduction Wireless Sport Headphone

The WiWU Q1 Air Conduction Wireless Sport Headphone is the ideal audio companion for active people, whether they're hitting the gym, going for a run, or simply enjoying the great outdoors. These headphones, designed with both performance and comfort in mind, are a must-have item for anybody looking to improve their workout or outdoor experience. The Q1's sleek and lightweight design guarantees a comfortable fit, allowing you to wear them for long periods of time without discomfort. With the Q1, you can concentrate on what really matters: your exercise or excursion. The Q1 has an incredible 6 hours of continuous playback thanks to its robust 120mAh battery. Whether you're listening to a playlist or a podcast, you can be certain that your music will continue to play uninterrupted. No need to be concerned about your headphones dying in the middle of a workout; the Q1 has you covered. The WiWU Q1 Air Conduction Neckband offers flawless wireless communication up to a distance of 15 meters thanks to powerful Bluetooth 5.2 technology. This means you can leave your phone in your gym bag or pocket and still listen to crystal-clear audio without interruption. Move around freely and without worry, knowing that your headphones will remain linked. The USB C charging connector makes charging your Q1 quick and easy. You may fully charge your headphones and be ready to go in only 1.5 hours. No more waiting for your headphones to charge for hours - with the Q1, you can go back to your hobbies in no time. The Q1 headphones are not only engineered for performance, but they are also water-resistant. This makes them appropriate for usage in a variety of weather circumstances, such as a sweaty exercise or a wet outdoor expedition. Don't let a little rain or perspiration get in the way of enjoying your music; the Q1 can handle it all. The Q1 has a standby duration of three months and is always ready to accompany you on your trips. You can trust that your headphones will be ready to go when you are, whether you are taking a break from your workouts or traveling on vacation. The WiWU Q1 Air Conduction Wireless Sport Headphone will enhance your listening experience. These headphones are ideal for energetic people who want to take their workouts or outdoor activities to the next level thanks to their high-performance features, elegant design, and comfortable fit. Choose the Q1 instead of lousy audio.

WiWU Ear Zero Pro Bluetooth TF Support Earphone

WiWU Ear Zero Pro Bluetooth TF Support Earphone has a design that is very sporty, with a circuit ear hook model that is not easily separated from the ear even when we use it for exercise.
 Apart from the circuit ear hook design, this earphone is ideal to  enjoy increase bass in your music, and wireless hands-free call management makes this wireless Bluetooth earphone an ideal choice for regular usage. The earbuds in this headphone is made with skin-friendly silicone. The earphone itself is IPX5 Certified Dust and Waterproof.This earphone has a very good and strong build because of the Titanium Alloy framework used in the speakers and body.

Battery and performance

The battery capacity is 160mah with an average charging time of 2 hours. At a full charge This earphone can have a standby time of approximately 300 hours. It also has an approximately music listening time 10 hours with one full charge. This earphone supports Bluetooth Version 5.0 for connectivity with an operational range of 10 meter distance. It has an impedance of 32Ohm with a frequency response range of 20 to 20000Hz. It supports HiFi sound.The best part is these earphones are slim enough to be used with glasses. This WiWU Bluetooth Earphoneis available in two Colors Black and Red. It weight around 12.8g. It has no warranty.
